modulename: replace with the name of the python module
repo_name: replace with the name for the package git repo
homepage: replace with the homepage of the upstream project
project_short_description: OpenStack Boilerplate contains all the boilerplate you need to create an OpenStack package.
project_long_description: OpenStack Boilerplate contains all the boilerplate you need to create an OpenStack package.
maintainer: name and email address of maintainer
